original: @220a ` // bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
analyzed: @220a ` // bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
translated: The Sādhana of Mahāśītavana

original: * // bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ni /
analyzed: * // bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ni /
translated: Mahāśītavana

original: phyag bzhi zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi zhal gcig pa /
translated: [has] four arms and one face.

original: kha dog dmar mo /
analyzed: kha dog dmar mo /
translated: [She is] red in color.

original: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na phreng ba dang mchog sbyin /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na phreng ba dang mchog sbyin /
translated: In the two right hands [she holds] a rosary and a boon-granting [hand].

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang / snying gar gnas pa'i po ti'i phyag mtshan no //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang / snying gar gnas pa'i po ti'i phyag mtshan no //
translated: In the two left hands [she holds] a vajra hook and the hand-symbol of a book resting on the heart.

original: dzram gi sa bon can /
analyzed: dzram gi sa bon can /
translated: [She has] the seed syllable jraṃ.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
translated: [She has] the crown of Amitābha.

original: na bza' dang rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: na bza' dang rgyan dang ldan pa /
translated: [She is] endowed with garments and ornaments.

original: nyi ma'i 'od dang gdan can te sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od dang gdan can te sngar bzhin no //
translated: [She has] the light and seat of the sun, as before.

original: bsil ba'i tshal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: bsil ba'i tshal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Śītavana is complete.

original: // / aom a'a: pram ma h'a pra ti s'a re h'um /
analyzed: // / aom a'a: pram ma h'a pra ti s'a re h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ praṃ mahāpratisarā hūṃ.

original: aom a'a: mam ma h'a m'a y'u ri h'um /🔽aom dh'um ma h'a sa ha sra pra marda ni h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: mam ma h'a m'a y'u ri h'um / aom dh'um ma h'a sa ha sra pra marda ni h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ maṃ mahāmāyūrī hūṃ.🔽Oṃ dhūṃ mahāsahasraprāmardani hūṃ.

original: aom a'a: h'um ma h'a mantra aa nu sa ri h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ma h'a mantra aa nu sa ri h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ mahāmantra anuśari hūṃ.

original: aom a'a: h'um ma h'a sh'i ta ba ni h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ma h'a sh'i ta ba ni h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ mahāśītavatī hūṃ.

original: slob dpon chen po dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon chen po dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of the great master Jetari Vijitāri is complete.

original: dang po dbus su lngas mchod /
analyzed: dang po dbus su lngas mchod /
translated: First, make offerings in the center with the five.

original: de nas phyogs bzhir /
analyzed: de nas phyogs bzhir /
translated: Then, in the four directions.

original: yang phyogs mtshams kyi dbus su mchod /
analyzed: yang phyogs mtshams kyi dbus su mchod /
translated: Again, make offerings in the center of the intermediate directions.

original: de nas gzungs la /
analyzed: de nas gzungs la /
translated: Then, to the dhāraṇī.

original: de nas 'khor lo la /
analyzed: de nas 'khor lo la /
translated: Then, to the wheel.

original: tha mar yang dbus phyogs bzhir gtang rag gi mchod pa bya /
analyzed: tha mar yang dbus phyogs bzhir gtang rag gi mchod pa bya /
translated: In the end, also make offerings of gratitude in the center and four directions.

original: de rnams la 'byor pa yod na mchod pa lnga chan bcu gsum gyis mchod do//
analyzed: de rnams la 'byor pa yod na mchod pa lnga chan bcu gsum gyis mchod do//
translated: If one has the means, make offerings with the thirteen sets of five offerings.

original: de ltar byas pas ni be te bcu gsum dgos so //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas ni be te bcu gsum dgos so //
translated: By doing so, one needs thirteen sets of offerings.

original: nas la sogs pa bzhi pos bskor zhing bsreg pa lan gnyis kyis cho ga ste /
analyzed: nas la sogs pa bzhi pos bskor zhing bsreg pa lan gnyis kyis cho ga ste /
translated: Surrounding and burning with the four beginning with barley twice is the ritual,

original: g-yas g-yon gyis lan re'o//
analyzed: g-yas g-yon gyis lan re'o//
translated: each time to the right and left.
